name: swade-powers
description: React website for quick access to the list of powers in SWADE
author: Chip Long <chip_long@yahoo.com>

scripts.install: cd client && yarn && cd dataSourceServer && yarn && cd ../server && yarn
scripts.dev: start cmd /k yarn serve && start cmd /k yarn dev:server && && start cmd /k yarn dev:client
scripts.test: start cmd /k yarn test:server && start cmd /k yarn test:client
scripts.lint: start cmd /k yarn lint:server && start cmd /k yarn lint:client
scripts.stage: start cmd /k yarn stage:server && start cmd /k yarn stage:client
scripts.coverage: start cmd /k yarn coverage:server && start cmd /k yarn coverage:client
